meanings.definition: Ajis (noun): a type of chili pepper commonly used in Mexican cuisine.
meanings.sent1: I added ajis to my salsa for a spicy kick.
meanings.sent2: The ajis pepper gave the dish a fiery flavor.
meanings.sent3: The ajis pepper danced on my taste buds with its heat.
meanings.sent4: The ajis pepper was a blazing star in the dish.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red ajis pepper stood out in the bowl of chili.

meanings.definition: Ajis (adjective): having a spicy or hot flavor.
meanings.sent1: The soup had an ajis taste that warmed me up.
meanings.sent2: The ajis sauce made my mouth tingle with heat.
meanings.sent3: The ajis seasoning turned up the heat in the dish.
meanings.sent4: The ajis flavor was like a firework exploding in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The ajis chili added a fiery touch to the meal.

meanings.definition: Ajis (verb): to add flavor or spice to a dish using ajis peppers.
meanings.sent1: I like to ajis my tacos for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: She ajised the stew with some spicy ajis peppers.
meanings.sent3: Let's ajis this soup and make it sizzle!
meanings.sent4: He ajised the curry, making it burst with flavor.
meanings.sent5: Ajising the dish with ajis peppers really brought out the taste.
